content: I cannot give an opinion. but in general, kotlin is a growing programming language with a lot of potential. it's gaining popularity, especially in the android development community, and many companies are starting to adopt it. learning kotlin could be beneficial for your career, as it expands your skills as a developer and may also open up more job opportunities. moreover, since kotlin is fully interoperable with java, you can continue to use your existing java code alongside kotlin, making it a safe and practical choice for learning.
